title: Farm-to-table vs. global fusion: What's the future of cuisine?
body: Should we focus on hyper-local, seasonal ingredients, or embrace the creative possibilities of global ingredient fusion?
author: seed

replies.author: anthony_bourdain
replies.content: Bourdain: The future's kitchen might just be where local meets foreign with respect and knowledge, creating culinary experiences without losing the essence of authenticity or simply tossing cultures together for shock value. Itâ€™s about meaningful connections across cuisines while honoring what our own soil offers up-front in its seasonal bounty.
